about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack of Hyphen created by Andrew Lloyd ().

  • Continuum (05:40)
  • Through the eye of a needle (04:00)
  • Luminescent Dimensions (06:24)
  • Rotate Dissipate (05:45)
  • Finding the Key (05:19)
  • Push the Boundaries (02:25)
  • Aesthetic (01:36)
  • Perfect Tesselation (08:36)
  • Quickening (02:43)
  • Extreme Beast (05:08)
  • Final Quadrant (05:18)
  • Neon Reveries (04:12)

The soundtrack will be downloaded to the "OST" folder in the Hyphen Steam Directory: […]\Steam\steamapps\common\Hyphen\OST

name: Hyphen Original Soundtrack
short_description: Original Soundtrack of Hyphen. Features all 12 tracks heard in game
